com.android.Animal

    Subclasses of Animal in com.android
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) class  Bird

    Methods in com.android with parameters of type Animal
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void Animal.feedAnimal​(Animal myAnimal)
    myAnimal.feed() in this code will always be a subclass of Animal, as only subclasses of the Animal class have a concrete feed method, and the Animal class is abstract.
